title: The tryal and execution of Father Henry Garnet, superior provincial of the Jesuits in England for the powder-treason collected by Roger Widdrington, a Roman Catholick, and by him addressed unto Pope Paul the Fifth, printed in Latin 1616 in his appendix to his Humble Supplication, p. 124, and thence translated. Now published to make it further evident, that it is no new thing for Jesuits to curse and ban, to justifie a lie.
author: Preston, Thomas, 1563-1640.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Widdrington's real name is given by DNB as Thomas Preston.
